definition: see 廢寢忘食|废寝忘食[fei4 qin3 wang4 shi2]
to forget/to overlook/to neglect
meal/to eat/classifier for meals
to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste
variant of 廢|废[fei4]/disabled
old variant of 寢|寝[qin3]
to lie down
waiting anxiously (idiom)
ink slab and sitting mat/place where one studies and teaches
lit. the mountains crumble and the trees lie ruined/a great sage has died (idiom)
cold pillow and lonely bed (idiom); fig. cold and solitary existence
to go astray and to not know how to get back on the right path (idiom)
(old) this way/this much
without news from sb (idiom)
people/the masses
youthful age
lit. clouds scatter, wind flows (idiom); the crisis settles down/people disperse home/things return to normal
to have an intimate friendship
to part for an unspecified period/to take leave from indefinitely
a pull-through to thread a needle/fig. to act as go-between
to scoop up water with the hands
